name: Backend Software Engineer /Python/
description:
We are opening the positions of Senior and Middle Engineers with Python knowledge, interested in developing well-structured and optimized APIs for various backend services.

Responsibilities:

  • Write clean and readable code using Python 3.x

  • Provide test coverage for said code

  • Be able to navigate other people’s code

  • Take part in code review processes

  • Provide the basic architecture for a new project in accordance with its requirements (for Senior position).

Requirements:

  • Strong knowledge of Python

  • Good knowledge of SQL

  • django (+drf), fastapi, async

  • sqlalchemy

  • celery

  • Ability to work in a team

  • Knowledge of general computer science foundations, data structures and respective algorithms and understanding big O notation (for Senior position)

  • CS education is a plus

Join our team of world-class data scientists and data engineers, and challenge yourself with some of the most pressing data science and engineering tasks of modern times!
